# Discussion Templates

## Ideas Category

This repository uses GitHub Discussions to gather and vote on ideas for future development.

### How to Propose an Idea

1. Go to the [Discussions](../../discussions) tab
2. Click "New discussion"
3. Select the "Ideas" category
4. Choose the "Idea" template
5. Fill out all required fields
6. Submit your idea

### How to Vote on Ideas

- Use the üëç (thumbs up) reaction on the main discussion post to vote for an idea
- You can also use other reactions to express different sentiments:
  - ‚ù§Ô∏è Love this idea
  - üéâ Excited about this
  - üëÄ Watching this closely

### Discussion Categories

- **Ideas**: Propose and vote on new ideas for the project
- **General**: General discussions about the project
- **Q&A**: Ask questions and get answers from the community

### Best Practices

- **Be Clear**: Provide detailed descriptions of your ideas
- **Be Respectful**: Engage constructively with others' ideas
- **Vote Thoughtfully**: Use reactions to support ideas you believe in
- **Provide Context**: Include examples, use cases, or references when possible
- **Stay On Topic**: Keep discussions focused on the specific idea or question
